post.body: Badum ching!
CRAP!! I TOTALLY FORGOT WITH THE PAINTING!! I'm going to eat dinner then get it up!
Me too. 2008 was pretty awesome, so it's going to be a hard call.
Thanks! They were so much fun to make!
Happy Birthday!!
JEALOUS!!
Planes are all cancelled out of Victoria right now, so I decided to make you gingerbread men!
I never want to see a paint brush again. But our 1st floor is no longer acid green.
Off to Fit it In at the Gym.
I love Pride and Prejudice.
Just signed up on Fitting it In. I need this.
My mom-in-law got me Melissa's book for Christmas. I didn't have the heart to tell her I already had it. She was so excited about it!
My sister in law got me a Gryffindor hat for Christmas! And gave my hubby a Slytherin one. Lol!
Merry Christmas everyone!
Time to get ready to head to the in-laws. I hope we make it there in all of this snow!
Kimday! http://tinyurl.com/9w4gw3
Eating gingerbread for breakfast. That's a balanced meal right?
I'm getting in on this FFS action...
Just made a 6 foot tall snowman. And yes, she's wearing my Gryffindor scarf.
Just made an army of gingerbread men from scratch, including the icing. (Which I am now eating the extra out of the bag)
